title: Patagonia
subtitle: Raft the mighty Futaleufu River and relax in riverside accommodations
short_description: This all-inclusive, week-long trip will take you to the banks of the legendary and majestic Futaleufu River. Raft, kayak, and hike to your heart's content, dine on fine wine and home-cooked meals, and wind down in your rustic riverside bungalow.
